title: BTS Accepts the 2021 American Music Award for Artist of the Year - The American Music Awards
author: ABC
description: Watch BTS's AMAs 2021 acceptance speech for Artist of the Year. Watch more highlights from 'The 2021 American Music Awards' and Stream Next Day on Hulu.
